alert.note: Alert for Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 11:07PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wichita and southwestern Logan Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1107 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Russell Springs, or 21 miles north of Leoti, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wichita and southwestern Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
